job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: This individual will work to monitor system health, investigate and troubleshoot delivery failures and/or related production issues, escalate issues as needed and take part in an on-call rotation (roughly every 5-6 weeks). The main focus of this role will be to monitor batch and real-time processing and support overall production support activity as well as aid in the automation of manual tasks.â¢ 3-5 years of operations experience with large-scale, high-availability distributed systemsâ¢ Application/Platform production support experienceâ¢ SQL/Oracle and UNIX functional proficiencyâ¢ An understanding of programming â java, javascript, web development, etc.â¢ On-call support experience with a critical platformâ¢ Familiarity with Batch/Scheduled job execution and troubleshootingâ¢ File Transfer Protocol (FTP) experienceâ¢ Scripting and automation experienceâ¢ Healthcare EDI/ANSI/X12 industry knowledgeâ¢ Splunk, New Relic, Solar Winds or other enterprise monitoring tool experience
